ygData.subject: Re: And on a completely unrelated subjec
ygData.msgSnippet: totally with you on this one... i have been begged to more times I care to remember. I do roleplay 50% of the time so sometimes i do give stuff or a litle
ygData.messageBody:
totally with you on this one... i have been
begged to more times I care to remember. I do roleplay
50% of the time so sometimes i do give stuff or a
litle money, but only when playing a cleric, enchanter
or mage. I refuse to give anything while playing a
dark elf... "A proud Teir'Dall does not need to beg.."
I do howerver go out of my way to help newbies esp.
those who are really new. (100 corpses in the area is a
tip off). i help them getting items or doing quests
or telling them about it. Or I show them where to
hunt in Nektulos. i once given 10 tiny daggers to a
lvl 1 enchanter in Qeynos. The where the last I had
and I was on my way to Odus anyhow.<br><br>However
most anoying are those who beg... then when you say
you don't give then anything keep asking why not? and
finally shout through the area that you're a
jerk...<br><br>just my two copper...<br><br>(haven't played for 3
weeks!!! aaargh I'm going mad! stupid SIMS.. sooooo
adictive)
